ai_description: Vibrant hexagonal dumbbells in multiple colors including pink, green, red, purple, orange and blue. Each features the KAKSS brand logo and weight designation printed in white on the ends. The dumbbells have a solid cast iron core with a smooth vinyl coating. One image shows a cutaway revealing the textured inner material. The packaging highlights features like smell-proof, non-toxic, and washable properties with colorful graphic icons.
product_name: Kakss Dumbbells Set For Gym Exercise
